channel.title: I need a server Help

item.title: I need a server Help
item.dc:creator: @shamii shamii
item.description:
@shamii wrote:

Hey I was wondering, does anyone know if this code:

if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs.absX, npcs.absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs.heightLevel)
if (npcs.npcType == 1158)

{
npcs.StartKilling = person.NPCId;
npcs.RandomWalk = false;
npcs.IsUnderAttack = true;
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs.absX, npcs.absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs.heightLevel)
if (npcs.npcType == 1158)
{
npcs.RandomWalk = true;
}
}
}

Could work like

if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs.absX, npcs.absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs.heightLevel)
if (npcs.npcType == 1158)

{
npcs.StartKilling = person.PlayerId;
npcs.RandomWalk = false;
npcs.IsUnderAttack = true;
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs.absX, npcs.absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs.heightLevel)
if (npcs.npcType == 1158)
{
npcs.RandomWalk = true;
}
}
}

Why:
I need a to make a special NPC that kills NPCs . . .
Can it work? (I don’t want to try the code yet)

Question 2:
Also I was also wondering how to make something Online, as the ways I’m trying are not working for me, perhaps put more detail to it.
I tried making an account on No-Ip, put my IP, downloaded the thingy, tried to put in the Ip/Server/Host in the Set Ip/Server/Host, I would try No-Hamachi but I don’t want to download it. Any Suggestions?

Question 3:
I need help making an quest, or atleast give me a code sketch so I could learn from that. So yeah basically that’s all the questions.

  1. Where do I put quests in?
  2. How do I code my own quests in?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2009, 10:32:49 pm[/size][hr]Mmm, no-one’s got a answer? >.>

Read full topic
